mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum , aa.* from (select * from MENTORING where MTR_JUMSU = (select max(MTR_JUMSU) from MENTORING ) ) aa) where rnum>0 and rnum<=3 order by rnum
select * from mentoring where mtr_seq <= (select max(mtr_seq) from mentoring ) and mtr_Seq >=(select max(mtr_Seq)-2 from mentoring)

select MEM_NICK from (select ROWNUM rnum , aa.*, bb.MEM_NICK from (select * from MENTORING where MTR_JUMSU = (select max(MTR_JUMSU) from MENTORING ) ) aa, MEMBER bb where aa.MEM_EMAIL = bb.MEM_EMAIL) where rnum>0 and rnum<=1
